alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 10:04AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and panhandle Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 to 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
